TV.t: 电视\n[计] 电视, 转移向量

TV star.t: [网络] 电视明星；最佳电视明星

TV stoned.t:
A person who is completely deaf and blind to everything but his favourite  show on television. 

He or she is unlikely to answer the phone, speak to anyone and do anything except sit and watch. 

He or she is also likely to be irritated or react badly if one tries to talk to him during that hour or in duration of his favourite TV shows that run in a row. 

> "Sorry, I can't get Bill to come to the phone. He's TV stoned at the mo. Call back after the show is over."

tv-antenna.t: [网络] 电视天线；室外电视天线；电视讯号接收天线

tvc.t: abbr. thrust vector control 推力矢量控制; thermal voltage converter 热电压变压器; total variable cost 总变动成本; temperature valve control 温度阀控制（器）

tvcs.t: abbr. thrust-vector control system 推力矢量控制系统; television communications subsystem 电视通信子系统; TSO/VTAM common service area 分时操作/虚拟（远程）通信接入法公共服务区; TSO/VTAM common storage area 分时操作/虚拟（远程）通信接入法公共存储区

tvn.t: abbr. television network 电视网; Television News 电视新闻; transcend virtual networking 超越虚拟联网; total volatile nitrogen 总挥发氮

tvs.t: abbr. 瞬变电压抑制二极管（Transient Voltage Suppressors）；电视观察系统（Television Viewing Systems）
